books.author: by Clive Cussler and Justin Scott
books.description: In the ninth book in this series, set in 1906, the New York detective Isaac Bell contends with a crime boss passing as a respectable businessman and a tycoon’s plot against President Theodore Roosevelt.
books.name: THE GANGSTER

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Emma Donoghue
books.description: The entire world of the 5-year-old boy who narrates this novel is the 11-by-11-foot room in which his mother is being held prisoner.
books.name: ROOM

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Rachel Hauck
books.description: With her own wedding approaching, Charlotte pieces together the history of a vintage gown she finds.
books.name: THE WEDDING DRESS

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A father hides a terrible secret to protect his son.
books.name: KEEP QUIET

books.author: by Kathleen Grissom
books.description: An Irish orphan is integrated into a slave family on a Virginia plantation.
books.name: THE KITCHEN HOUSE

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman returning to her hometown discovers that her husband was a fraud who implicated her in his deceptions.
books.name: THE LIAR

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: The detective D.  D. Warren hunts for a missing woman who was kidnapped and abused as a student and may have become a vigilante.
books.name: FIND HER

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A police detective who left the force when his family was murdered teams up with his former partner to solve the case.
books.name: MEMORY MAN

books.author: by Michael Punke
books.description: Left for dead after a mauling, a master tracker is consumed by a singular desire for revenge; an inspiration for the 2015 film.
books.name: THE REVENANT

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Colm Toibin
books.description: An unsophisticated young Irishwoman leaves her home for New York in the 1950s. The basis of the movie.
books.name: BROOKLYN
